location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Dow, Assistant Surgeon, Temporarily in Charge of the Residency, Bushire, to John Wedderburn, Accountant General, Bombay

mods.abstract: In this letter, James Dow, Assistant Surgeon, temporarily in charge of the Residency, transmits the first and third of a set of vouchers (not included) furnished to William Bruce, the Resident at Bushire, by Henry Willock, His Majesty's Chargé d’Affaires at the Court of Persia.
